basics.name: Amir Gafner
basics.label: Senior Web Developer
basics.summary: Abstract thinker and ambitious problem solver with passion for user-facing software products. Creates logical and innovative solutions to complex problems, with a keen interest in technology, mobile development, and user experience. Expert knowledge of JavaScript, coupled with significant experience in Python, Php, and C++. Outstanding communication with the ability to coordinate multiple projects from initiation to completion in a deadline-driven environment.

work.summary: Developed and designed Reactful services from the bottom up. Using Webpack, Babel, ES2017, React and Redux. Crafted flawless user experiences, integrated innovative design principles and system architecture patterns. Manage team/company releases and feature roadmaps. Implemented latest technologies and services across the full web stack, including Google Services, Stripe, intercom, and Segment

Inventing and designing Spinbound a mobile game. Built with cocos2dx C++ Game engine for android and IOS. Designing all aspects of the game from user interface to game design. Integrating Google Analytics, Google play services, Apple Game center and Admob services.

Full stack Javascript development - MeanJS stack (mongo express angular node). Developing end to end features Building single page application for managing reservations and booking insights history, along with pricing recommendation and listing stats on airbnb. Integrating Stripe and Firebase for real time notification and operation system.

Leading front end development, responsible for a reporting system with data tables, graphs and charts using Backbone and Marionette over NginX and Php Symfony framework. Building cross browser dynamically loaded extensions components and an automated development management tools with Gruntjs

Developing Facebook connected Chrome extension for watching and collecting videos. Creating a short youtube video preview using advanced Canvas abilities creating gifs for viral video feed. Working in close collaboration within a cross-functional team to define and develop product roadmaps.

keywords: Codeing, Music, Art, Philosophy, International Relations, Mars
